remarks: The integral of a function, ` F ` stays the same if its closed interval domain is shifted by ` T ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
itgiccshift.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
itgiccshift.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
itgiccshift.aleb $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
itgiccshift.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
itgiccshift.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR+ ) $.
itgiccshift.g $e |- G = ( x e. ( ( A + T ) [,] ( B + T ) ) |-> ( F ` ( x - T ) ) ) $.
itgiccshift $p |- ( ph -> S. ( ( A + T ) [,] ( B + T ) ) ( G ` x ) _d x = S. ( A [,] B ) ( F ` x ) _d x ) $.
